M

main(String[]) - Static method in class BuildingCentreReceipt.Main
Demonstrates the principle use of the classes of the building centre.
In main you create and display the receipt text for the shopping cart print the receipt to file "BuildingCentreReceipt" filter the shopping cart with search term "Brick" sort the shoppingcart by name and display again
Main - Class in BuildingCentreReceipt
Demo application of the buildin centre.
Main() - Constructor for class BuildingCentreReceipt.Main
 
Matcher<T> - Interface in BuildingCentreReceipt
 
matches(BuildingCentreProductBase) - Method in class BuildingCentreReceipt.FullTextMatcher
matches a product against the patternof this matcher.
a product is considered to match if the name contains the pattern of this matcher.
matches(T) - Method in interface BuildingCentreReceipt.Matcher
Matches a object against the pattern of this matcher.
Material - Class in BuildingCentreReceipt
A certian quantity of building material which can be purchased in the building centre as a product.
For all material, a maximum amount of 250 can be delivered.
Material(Material) - Constructor for class BuildingCentreReceipt.Material
Copies a material.
Material(String, String, double, int) - Constructor for class BuildingCentreReceipt.Material
Constructs a material with specified name, self storage name, price and count.
MAXIMUM_AMOUNT_TO_DELIVER - Static variable in class BuildingCentreReceipt.Material
the maximum amount that can be delivered.
